commitMessage:
fix: restore multiple decision gathering in /decide command (HODGE-284)

## What Changed
- Enhanced decide.md with Decision Categories Framework (6 categories)
- Added requirement for "(Recommended)" option in each decision
- Updated explore.md to require "Decisions Needed" documentation
- Added 6 smoke tests validating template changes
- Restructured decision gathering to check exploration first, then categories

## Why This Change
The /decide command was only presenting one decision instead of gathering
multiple decisions from the exploration phase and codebase. Users expected
2-3 decisions to be presented for comprehensive decision-making. This fix
ensures the decide command systematically checks all decision categories.

## Impact
- /decide now presents 2-3 decisions consistently
- Each decision shows a recommended option for clarity
- Better integration between explore and decide phases
- Improved decision coverage across 6 key categories

## Technical Details
- Primary source: exploration.md "Decisions Needed" section
- Secondary sources: 6 decision categories always checked
- All changes are template-only (markdown files)
- Tests verify framework presence and requirements

Closes HODGE-284
